scope: Validate the MVP browser flow from parameter input to generated lofi playback using Strudel REPL.
Verify functional behavior and error handling for generation, playback controls, loading, retry, and audio capability constraints.
Ensure all iteration functional requirements (FR-1 to FR-6) are covered with automated tests aligned to Vitest and React component/lib structure.
environmentData: Runtime: modern desktop browser environment with Web Audio API support (plus mocked unsupported/autoplay-blocked scenarios).
Tooling: `bun`, Vite, Vitest, and React Testing Library for automated UI and integration tests.
Test data fixtures: representative parameter sets (mood: chill/melancholic/upbeat, tempo boundaries and nominal values, style: jazz/hip-hop/ambient).
Strudel integration tests use deterministic mocks/stubs for REPL init/play/pause/seek and failure cases.
## User Story: US-001 - Configure Lofi Parameters

automatedTests.description: Render parameter controls for mood selector, tempo input/slider, and style preset with required options.
Verify sensible default values are preselected for mood, tempo, and style on initial load.
Update each control and assert no generation call is triggered until Generate is clicked.
Map selected parameters to a Strudel pattern string and invoke REPL execution when Generate is clicked.
Show loading indicator during REPL initialization and clear it on terminal success/failure states.
Success path enables playback controls and suppresses error state.
Failure path shows actionable error message and supports retry that reattempts generation cleanly.
Click Generate repeatedly during in-progress run and verify defined concurrency behavior (ignore duplicate or queue policy) with consistent UI state.
Simulate autoplay-blocked or unsupported Web Audio environments and assert specific user-facing guidance message.
Simulate REPL success callback with silent/no-output signal and assert warning/error is surfaced to user.
After successful generation, verify player appears/updates and exposes native Strudel-backed play, pause, and seek actions.
Validate play/pause/seek command flow through `src/lib/strudel.ts` wrappers with mocked REPL responses.
End-to-end browser run confirms generated audio playback starts under supported Web Audio environment without extra plugins.

exploratoryManualTests.description: Assess subjective UX clarity of control affordances and rhythm of visual feedback while adjusting controls. Manual justification: subjective perception of visual feel and interaction comfort is not reliably measurable via DOM/state assertions.
